text:
1. Countering the "Argument from Contingency"

Mufti‚Äôs Question: Everything in the universe is dependent (contingent). If everything depends on something else, doesn't there have to be a "Necessary Being" at the start to avoid an infinite chain?

The Counter-Answer:
The Fallacy of Composition: Just because parts of the universe are contingent doesn't mean the universe as a whole is contingent. One could argue that Matter-Energy itself is the "Necessary" entity. According to the First Law of Thermodynamics, energy cannot be created or destroyed; it only changes form. Therefore, the "Prime Cause" could simply be the eternal existence of energy/matter, which doesn't require consciousness or intent.
Special Pleading: If the Mufti argues that "everything must have a cause," but then exempts God from that rule, he is using a logical fallacy called Special Pleading. If a God can exist without a cause, then the Universe (or a quantum singularity) can also exist without a cause. Adding a "God"

text:
ST‚ÄìSC categories ke andar bhi do tarah ke log hote hain ‚Äî ek financially strong (elite class) aur dusre financially weak (poor class). Problem yahi hoti hai ki reservation ka actual fayda un bachchon ko milna chahiye jinki background weak hoti hai, par kai baar awareness, resources aur support ki wajah se elite families zyada benefit le leti hain.

Iska matlab yeh nahi ki elite category wale galat hain, lekin ground reality yeh hai ki poor families tak reservation ka poora benefit nahi pahunch pata. Caste-based reservation ke andar bhi economic difference ek bada factor ban chuka hai.

Isliye system ko aise design hona chahiye ki jinko sach me help ki zarurat hai ‚Äî unhe priority mile, chahe wo ST ho ya SC. Main khud ST background se hoon, isliye yeh cheez ground level par aur clearly samajh aati hai.

text: Jahangir National University (JNU) naam se Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU) movies bani hai jisme same incident ko so called valid reason bata ke mention Kiya hai. Movies me left wing ke students badhti fees ka virodh karte hue protest karte hai and students ko bolte admission mat lo jab tak fees Kam nhi hoti. But jab kuch students admission lene jate hai tab unko left wing ke students mar ke bhaga dete hai. Phir uska badala lene ke liye right wing AIVP ke students (real me ABVP) lathiyo se left wing ke students ko marte hai, usi bich jab ek student police phone krti hai, tab police gate pe car khadi krke soüò™ jati hai( kyunki unko Dean ki permission nhi thi), kyunki isse pehle jab woh (police) campus me aa rahe the tab left wing ke students ne unhe Dean ki permission lene ke liye kaha tha. Puri movie aisi bahut si events and dialogues dikhaye gaye jisse JNU ki badnami ho. Movie me real events ko manipulate krke bataya gya hai. Kanhaiya Kumar, Umer Khalid, Ravi Kumar, PM Modi inka ment
